bug.author: miguelgfierro
bug.summary: Nightly tests are passing even if they fail
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is affected by this bug?</denchmark-h>
As can be seen <denchmark-link:https://msdata.visualstudio.com/AlgorithmsAndDataScience/_build/results?buildId=2156310>here</denchmark-link> , nightly tests are passing even though there is an error. We need to review the pipelines to make sure when there is an error, the test fails and it is reported <denchmark-h:h3>In which platform does it happen?</denchmark-h>
Azure Data Science Virtual Machine.
<denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the issue?</denchmark-h>
run tests/smoke/test_notebooks_python.py <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
if a test fails, there should be an error in VSTS <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/recommenders/pull/420>#420</denchmark-link>
